activity.title: Drag and Drop Multiple
activity.instructions: Drag the correct word(s) into each sentence.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: A <blank word="single"/>   room has only one bed.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: I’d like a <blank word="non-smoking"/>   room, please. I don’t smoke.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: You call <blank word="room service"/>   when you want to order food from your hotel room.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: A <blank word="king-size"/>   bed is bigger than a queen-size bed.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: A <blank word="rollaway"/>   bed is an extra bed you can bring into any size room.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: I’d like to buy some postcards. Is the <blank word="gift shop"/>   still open?

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)
audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)
audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)
